item.title: Deploying Infrastructure on Proxmox with Ansible
item.description: I’ve broken down my HomeLab, and I’m rebuilding it in Ansible for deployment on a Proxmox cluster. Configure Proxmox for ansible I’ve been working off morph027’s workflow for a first successful run. He uses the ansible plugin proxmox_kvm, and I’m using proxmox (for containers). Infrastructure Short and sweet: [proxmox] gold silver bronze Setup script To get my blood pumping, I wrote a playbook to configure the three nodes: # install_pip.
